channel.title: Interface Related stuff
channel.description:
im currently coding an allstar, and i wanna make a drop party room using the interface. i need to know how to make the items go into the bar when you click them, and then after you click the accept button the balloons drop.
NOTE : THIS IS ALLSTAR
help is very much appreciated
*not asking for spoonfeeds, just a simple explanation
